PAYMENT.TITLE: Submit credit card information
PAYMENT.ONCE_YOU_SUBMIT: Once you submit your credit card information to us, we will process the required payment and use this as your authorization for subsquent required payments such as a final payment if only a deposit was received, and the security deposit 72 hours prior to the booking start date.
PAYMENT.ALL_INFORMATION_REMAIN_CONFIDENTAL: All information will remain confidential and encrypted in our system.
PAYMENT.AGREE_CONDITION_DETAIL: I agree that to our terms and conditions which will stipulate that RVezy will charge their credit card for any damages and that RVezy take a pre authorization charge.
